name: American Glass Products Company
overview: American Glass Products Company develops, produces, and sells security glass products. Its products include tempered and laminated, bullet resistant, temperature and sun protection, and specialty glass. The companyâ€™s products are used in various applications, including automotive OEM and ARG, retrofit, military, marine, architectural, furniture, and refrigeration. It serves law enforcement, government, corporate, and private clients in the United States, Mexico, Central America, Panama, Colombia, Venezuela, Peru, Brazil, Chile, Argentina, Uruguay, Spain, Europe, the Middle East, Iraq, and Japan. American Glass Products Company was founded in 1965 and is based in Knoxville, Tennessee. It has manufacturing plants and commercial offices in the United States, Europe, Asia, and Central and South America.
